title: Breaking Point
description: Being trapped in an asylum for years, all Alice wants to do is go back to her beloved Wonderland, but is Wonderland truly real or just a mere fiction of her imagination.Breaking Point is a four part novel discussing problems ranging from sanity, love, desperation and even denial. All parts has its own story to tell, whether it dangles on the brink of reality or imagination.
author: Roxanne M. Dawson
